reviews.review:
Decian que era una joya....
No me lo decian me lo afirmaban

I've spent days upon days playing Left 4 Dead, so I have no idea why Steam only shows my time played as 12 hours... When L4D was released I spent countless hours playing the campaigns on expert difficulty together with 2 friends, and the demo before that. Those are some of my most cherished gaming memories and most fun and intense coop gameplay I've ever experienced.

Left 4 Dead 2 is the better game, there is no doubt about that since it included all the campaigns from this one aswell several new ones. But the sequel didn't have the impact that this one had.

It's a great formula for coop which as inspired many more clones of the genre. Even if the zombie theme is a tired trope, it's really easy to get hooked into these types of games. As far as this series goes, I much prefer the first over the second.

No matter if you have friends to play with or not, you'll still have a great time with this one.
Shoot the zomibes, rescue friends. Old edition.

A really good game don't get me wrong, but there is no reason to play this game other than for nostalgia. The sequel has more weapons, maps, and better graphics. 9/10, but I most likely won't play this game again for a while. I recommend getting Left 4 Dead 2, it costs the same as this one.
i just played it for the first time in almost a year, and i had the weirdest glitches. Boomer hunters, tank boomers, witch hunters, crouch double jumping and much more. 10/10.

Despite this game being released in 2008, it aged very well. The effects, story, graphics, and animation is very well done. Not to mention there's a multiplayer option to play with other people or friends. This game will have you at the edge of your seat and will not get tired of it. It is worth the $10 for anyone who is interested.

Só compre caso queira jogar a experiência original de L4D1, caso contrário, compre L4D2 e jogue as campanhas do L4D1 que já vem nele, inclusive tem uma mutation do L4D2 chamada L4D1 Coop que permite você jogar as campanhas do L4D1 como foram originalmente intendidas. No mais recomendado, compre o Valve Complete Pack nas sales Summer ou Winter (Principalmente na Winter, em que provavelmente estará com 90% de desconto) que irá vir os dois juntos por um preço ultra barato.

Sobre o jogo:
Roda em qualquer PC, tem uma atmosfera foda, gameplay variada a cada vez que tu joga e todas as campanhas são boas.
All content is available on L4D2 instead. Not many servers available for this version.

убиваем танка,
здираем кожу с толстяка и вытаскиваем мясо из танка,
перемешиваем и кладём в духовку на 30 минут, вкуснятина приятного аппетита
